pullRequest.title: benchmark for indexed table experiments
pullRequest.bodyText: Adds loading and cursor scan time benchmarks for the BroadcastSegmentIndexedTable added in #10224, to be used to compare future improvements (or alternative implementations of IndexedTable).

nodes.bodyText: This includes benchmarking closing the table. I'm not sure how much of a difference that would make. Do you want this benchmark to measure just makeTable?
